### Mike "Surace" Surace
**Hometown:** Pedge  
**Record:** 31 - 34  
**Skill:** Draft Day Blackouts  

Surace, one of the five GMs of the Inebo to be able to call himself a champion, is another member of PEDGE. Suarce is famously known for his ability to drink excsessive amounts of alcohol on draft day and still walk away with a solid draft grade. Surace currently ranks fourth of all GMs and is looking to climb the rankings with another stellar season in 2017.
